name: NecroLand: Battle Royale
description:
The Necromancer's Survival Game in the diesel-punk world

Taming and Rule the undead! 

 You can use 'Taming Skill' to the fainted undead to transfer into your own combat unit. 


 'NecroLand : Battle Royale' is a multi-play game of a battle royale genre where they fight until the player is left alone. You need to survive until the last by defeating all enemies you meet and avoid the harmful gas that is coming towards your way.

Concept

In the world of NecroLand, the weak people loses their mind and changes their body by suffering the war and turns into an undead. The greedy rulers uses these undead into a unit and continues with the final war.


In order to keep our creativity within these battle royale trends, ours is based on the post apocalypse world where machines and undead appear.

Play with friends!

 Multi-play is also possible in the demo version. Instead, only one character type can be selected. You can also make a secret room and play with your friends. There may be bugs that have not been found. We promise to keep the demo updated. And we're ready to hear your feedback. Please send your comments via email or Twitter.
 * E-mail : lab.janus@gmail.com
 * Twitter : https://twitter.com/LabJanus

'NecroLand : Battle Royale' will be released on Steam Early-Access within Dec 2019.

Controls

Currently, only the keyboard and mouse are supported.
Your Units automatically attack like Units in RTS.
 Arrow Keys : Move
 Spacebar Key : Taming
 Shift Key : Order your units to follow you
 A, S, D, F, G Keys : Use Item
 Tab Key : Show/Hide Map
 Z Key : Show/Hide Player List 
 K Key : Show controls popup
